By clicking you are Agreeing to Privacy Policy\n and Terms & Conditions

Privacy Policy 
we recognize that privacy is significant. This Privacy Policy applies to all apps (Android) under the publisher name of "ITS Digital Era". We have created this Policy to explain our privacy practices so you can understand what information about you is collected, used and disclosed. We collect information from you in order to provide corresponding service and better user experience. With your consent of this Privacy Policy, your usage, statistics, input while using our apps would be collected. 

Special note 
Our application has nothing to do with the gambling or batting of Tagged, Tagged and Our application is just for live score and cricket information. 

Our Privacy Commitment 
This application respects your right to privacy. Your ability to make informed choices about the use of your information is important to us. We do not collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Services to you. 

Permissions in this Application are the Following 
Internet Permissions 

Changes to this Privacy Policy 
We may change this privacy policy from time to time by posting the most current privacy policy and its effective date. If we change this privacy policy substantially, we may bring such changes to your attention by explicit notice on this page. 

Third-party links 
We do not include or offer third-party products or services on our applications. 

Children Privacy 
Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 (Children). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children have provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers. 

Contact Us 
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact our team. 
You can find out more information by clicking on the following link:

1. Quiet on the night before Christmas. Magic is coming into the world. A fairy tale is walking home in dreams looking to us. May the Nativity of Christ give your heart joy and peace, and hope shine on your family with a Christmas star. 
2. Faith is a miracle that will awaken love and kindness! Merry Christmas. We wish you happiness, joy, peace, light, warmth. May all your dreams come true! 
3. May the Lord help you in your efforts, love, and understanding. Jesus Christ was born into a world where evil and sin. The holy God descended from heaven to save everyone. Let the holy angels circle over your house, sparkling with the golden lights. 
4. This Christmas, I wish everyone happiness, love, kindness. May the birth of Christ will bring you peace and joy. 
5. Faith will power you. May the Lord help you with everything! On this bright winter evening, May health is stronger, and goodness comes into the house every minute. Merry Christmas! 
6. Birth of Christ is that fabulous holiday in which all dreams and wishes come true. That’s why I wish you only good health and luck. Let the sun not leave your home and your heart. Merry Christmas! 
7. On this beautiful Christmas, let love fill the heart, and all pain will go away. Let the ray of goodness look through your window in the morning. May tomorrow be more beautiful than yesterday with God’s blessing! 
8. Let miracles continue, and joy burn in your eyes. On the enjoyable Christian holiday, the day of Christmas, Let the Guiding Star shine brightly in the sky! May the angels of the Lord protect you from all troubles! 
9. Best wishes to my beloved friend for the fantastic year ahead! May the happiness always shine above you and love to surround you! Merry Christmas! 
10. Every new year comes big challenges and obstacles in life. I wish you courage, hope, and faith to overcome all the hurdles you face. May you have a great year and a wonderful time ahead! Merry Christmas & Happy New Year! 
11. On this cozy Christmas holiday, I wish you happiness into the house so that the whole family is healthy and all dreams come true! Do not let your soul get tired of doing good. I wish you to live in peace and joy! 
12. A star shines in the sky. It’s Christmas. I wish you on this beautiful evening happiness, peace, prosperity to you. Let your wishes come true. Merry Christmas! Let the bright holiday bring you faith, goodness, love, good luck, health, and happiness. 
13. In the beauty of the season and the joy of Christmas Day, May you find the true meaning that brings you happiness. As I think about our friendship and how happy it has made me, I want to wish you happiness in the year to come! 
14. Keep your spiritual purity and faith in God. May this magical day make your dreams come true! I wish you happiness and luck. May the angel protect you from sorrows and difficulties. Merry Christmas & happy new year! 
15. Please accept my honest thanks and best wishes for the holiday season and the upcoming new year! Thank you for allowing me to work with you this year. It has been an honor and a precious experience for me. I wish you a merry Christmas and a new year filled with all good things. 
16. Let Baby christ guide you on the way to add health to you. Let flowers bloom in your soul. May there be simple joys, and inspire again and again with hope, faith, and love to your life. 
17. Merry Christmas. On this bright holiday, I want to wish you can see only the good in the world around you and find everything good in people making all your dreams come true. Sincerely believe and never forget about pure human happiness. I wish you to appreciate everything that you have and enjoy every moment of your life 
18. Where evil spells are powerless, good always wins. Let the angel protect your beautiful home. May this enjoyable holiday will warm your hearts. I wish you a Merry Christmas! On this day, Christ was born. 
19. On the day of this bright Christmas of Christ, say only kind words. Let your head spin happily from this holy celebration. 
20. A bright star is lighting in the sky, which brings hope to all of us. So let it always shine for you as it never leaves you. May your house full of happiness, and everything is perfect as always. Merry Christmas to you! Love you!

Christmas is an annual festival commemorating the birth of Jesus Christ, observed primarily on December 25 as a religious and cultural celebration among billions of people around the world. A feast central to the Christian liturgical year, it is preceded by the season of Advent or the Nativity Fast and initiates the season of Christmastide, which historically in the West lasts twelve days and culminates on Twelfth Night. Christmas Day is a public holiday in many countries, is celebrated religiously by a majority of Christians, as well as culturally by many non-Christians, and forms an integral part of the holiday season organized around it.
\nThe traditional Christmas narrative recounted in the New Testament, known as the Nativity of Jesus, says that Jesus was born in Bethlehem, in accordance with messianic prophecies. When Joseph and Mary arrived in the city, the inn had no room and so they were offered a stable where the Christ Child was soon born, with angels proclaiming this news to shepherds who then spread the word.
\nThere are different hypotheses regarding the date of Jesus birth and in the early fourth century, the church fixed the date as December 25. This corresponds to the traditional date of the winter solstice on the Roman calendar. It is exactly nine months after Annunciation on March 25, also the date of the spring equinox. Most Christians celebrate on December 25 in the Gregorian calendar, which has been adopted almost universally in the civil calendars used in countries throughout the world. However, part of the Eastern Christian Churches celebrate Christmas on December 25 of the older Julian calendar, which currently corresponds to January 7 in the Gregorian calendar. For Christians, believing that God came into the world in the form of man to atone for the sins of humanity, rather than knowing Jesus\' exact birth date, is considered to be the primary purpose in celebrating Christmas.
